abstracts.cdata!:
A three-year program to help finance
            project preparation studies leading to high priority
            investment in the economy and to expand the capacity of
            Somali institutions to manage preinvestment work. The main
            risk would be that implementation of the project may be
            delayed because of difficulty to recruit a suitable Project
            Advisor for the Technical Department. The project will cost
            US$3.8 million of which US$3 million would be in foreign
            costs. Financing for the foreign costs will be provided by
            IDA and the Government will cover the local costs.
